P88

A modified P 88 Compact for the marksman.
Proven technology, outstanding shooting performance, cleanly adjustable single action trigger, manually operated safety only.

P 88 Champion with compensator.

  • Technical Data P88 Competition

Technical Data   P 88 Champion
Date of manufacture    
Caliber   9mm Para
System   Single action, recoil-operated
Locking Mechanism   Tilting barrel (Browning)
Safety   Lever
Weight, Empty   30.9 oz (875g)
Length   9.1" (232mm)
Height   5.5" (140mm)
Width   1.53" (39mm)
Barrel Length   6" (150mm)
Rifling    6 grooves
Twist   Right hand 
Magazine Capacity   14 Cartridges
Material   Steel slide/alloy frame
Finish   Blued/anodized
Grip Plates   Walnut

Technical Data   P 88 Sport
Date of manufacture   1995 to present
Caliber   .22LR
System   Single action, recoil-operated
Locking Mechanism   Blowback action
Safety   Lever
Weight, Empty   565g
Length   9.1" (230mm)
Height   5.3" (134mm)
